import React, { useContext, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { UserContext } from './App'; const Navbar = () => { const { state, dispatch } = useContext(UserContext); const [search, setSearch] = useState('') const [projectDetails, setProjectDetails] = useState([]) const RenderMenu = () => { if (state) { return ( <>
  • What We Do
  • Start a Campaign
  • Logout
    • ) } else { return ( <>
  • What We Do

  • Sign Up
    • ) } } return ( <>

    ); }; export default Navbar;
